title: China NPC: Beijing set to overhaul Hong Kong electoral system
content:
1. China NPC: Beijing set to overhaul Hong Kong electoral system  BBC News
  2. Demanding Loyalty, China Moves to Overhaul Hong Kong Elections  The New York Times
  3. Hong Kong court grants bail to 15 of 47 pro-democracy activists in landmark national security hearing  CNN
  4. Hong Kong activists: 15 of 47 granted bail but remain detained pending appeal  BBC News
  5. China legislature to deliberate Hong Kong electoral changes  The Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
